questions.question: Watch the video. Is Máxima a human rights defender by defending water and the environment?

choices.answer: Yes
No
Be officially recognized as one by the United Nations
Defend human rights through non-violent means
Not undermine the human rights of others
Work in a professional setting on human rights

questions.question: 'You can only be a Human Rights Defender if you defend human rights on a daily basis.' This...

choices.answer: is true
is false
I'm not sure of
depends on which human right you are defending

questions.question: (0 pts) Malala is a human rights defender. Can you think of others?

choices.answer: Yes! I know one.
Yes! I know more than one.
I wouldn't know of anyone really.
Maybe, but I am not sure if they qualify as a defender

questions.question: (0 pts) Most killings were recorded against which category of defenders globally in 2015?

choices.answer: Environmental activists
Journalists
Humanitarian professionals working in war zones

questions.question: 'To be a human rights defender you can’t have been convicted of a crime'. This is...

choices.answer: true, you need the law on your side
false, many defenders are unjustly accused by authorities
maybe true, maybe false, I am not sure

questions.question: Watch the video first. What are ancestral lands?

choices.answer: Lands/territories/resources belonging to Indigenous peoples
Lands not yet formally developed for civilization
New lands discovered and claimed by colonizers centuries ago

questions.question: Apart from access to land, people in the video protect other rights. Which can you identify?

choices.answer: The right to adequate housing
The right to work
The right to food
The right to health

questions.question: The right to land is part of international treaties. Is everyone entitled to this right?

choices.answer: Yes, these rights are universal and apply to everyone
No, a right to territory never applies to citizens
It depends, only Indigenous peoples can claim this right

questions.question: Watch the video. Who is responsible for attacking land & environmental rights defenders?

choices.answer: Police and army
Governments
Companies
Other citizens

questions.question: The State should consult Indigenous peoples about plans that may affect them. This means...

choices.answer: their traditional decision-making process must be respected
the State should seek their consent
they should invite the community leader to speak on behalf
a questionnaire should be sent out to all people

questions.question: (0 pts) Are specific land & environment related violations affecting the community you live in?

choices.answer: Yes, definitely
Not that I know of
No, we are all pretty good here

questions.question: (0 pts) The Peace River Valley can hear your voice of support. Do you know how to reach them?

choices.answer: Yes, and I would like to reach out to them!
Yes, but then again, why would I? It's not my issue
No, I have no idea how to reach out and what I can do
